title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: HEC-RAS model format, stand alone models archive formats, incompatable end users whose use case includes widespread accounting deployment data inputs workflows. tool deployed ingest HEC-RAS models “HECRAS_model_catalog”, normalized spatialized representation models requisite metadata formatting needed mesh seamlessly national scale hydrofabric efforts data models, applications T-Route RAS2FIM.

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: hydraulic models prolific HEC-RAS, since ’s first named release 1995 users created models using public private data countless hours engineering scrutinization order generate best possible purpose-built representation world. Like model, level input massaging necessary order get data specified mathematical format model requires. Like domain specific software solutions, massaging rather, forceful, point permanently altering shape inputs something geospatial data readers unable handle. creates great deal friction terms model accountability interoperability, particularly take standpoint model consumer. R based HEC-RAS Wrestler (RRASSLER) mediate .

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: order wrassle friction, RRASSLER theoretical value judgments need described order help understand use properly. RRASSLER focused making critical data objects needed run HEC-RAS model readily available accountable model (opposed individual data points large clusters otherwise “vistigal” data; emphasis particular geometric realization model). also designed standardized centralized source models, regardless origin. reason, RRASSLER expects operate within ’s controlled directory, “HECRAS_model_catalog”. Users first download unpack desired models temporary location, point RRASSLER directory place want store catalog. : 1) Scrape entire directory structure HEC-RAS model projects 2) geometric realization model (variation .g##), grab Attempt place model space. done attempting parse g** g**.hdf files, guess projections, pulling collating data xid-xyz table. Using extracted geometry, attempt create model footprint (hull). can constructed, model assumed correctly placed space. relevant model files copied uniquely parsed “final_model_name_key” folder /models/ folder. creation model hull errors , model placed _/models/unprocessed folder investigation, correction, rewrassling. iterations files done, RRASSLER (re)generate unified source model footprints, cross sections, points (now spatial form) HEC-RAS model, pointers back copied source data remains unaltered.

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: line Next Gen hydrofabric parameters Attribute Description layers hy_id: hydrofabric specific, globally unique flowpath/flowline identifier flowlines, transects, cs_ptsgeometry: Simple Features Geometry (LINESTRING) flowlines, transectscs_source: Source transect information transectscs_id: Identifier, unique hy_id, increases inlet outlet transects, cs_ptscs_measure: Percent along flowpath inlet transectscs_length: Width (meters) cross section transect transects pt_id: Identifier, unique cs_id, increases left band right bank cs_pts pt_measure: Percent along transect left bank (0-1) cs_pts relative_dist: Distance cs_id, starting 0, meters cs_ptsX: X coordinate CRS geometry cs_ptsY: Y coordinate CRS geometry cs_ptsZ: Z coordinate (meters) CRS geometry cs_pts Z_source: Source elevation data cs_ptsroughness: (Optional) Estimated Manning’s Roughness value cs_pts RAS Source extensions: hy_id: hydrofabric specific, globally unique flowpath/flowline identifier flowlines, transects, cs_ptsmean_shift: amount space added normalize cross section’s station-elevation geographic distance. Positive indicates distance added station-elevation series make match line (length) specified geography. reported running sum. roughness: (Optional) status now (Required)

what: I am both an archivist/model creator and a RRASSLER user
title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: unfortunately keep two copies data. RRASSLER isn’t creating anything don’t already archive one form another, completely removes metadata formatting archive painstakingly created. Don’t change workflow, consider RRASSLER “post-processing” step archiving work.

title: R based HEC-RAS model accounting wrestler
text: Aligning different model surfaces hard. Although every effort made account standard edge cases unit cohesion, , often , find surface use model align. particularly surprising, often disconcerting. 3DEP timestamps, resolutions, even order reprojection operations may alter surfaces slightly, even stated come input database. sanity checks try lose mind. Finally, developed, tested, deployed primarily 1D data. Although 2D model ingest, consideration accounting copying .tif files value models greatly diminished.
